Prerequisites Master in Medicine

You use your medical training to ameliorate sickness or assuage fears.

When you use Medicine to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid}, instead of Stabilizing a character or Stopping Bleeding, you can reduce an allyâ€™s @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 2, or remove either of those conditions entirely on a critical success. You can remove only one condition at a time.

The DC for the Medicine check is usually the DC of the effect that caused the condition.
